trap = WEST function toggletraps(value, sender) if value then if trap == WEST then no["trapwest"]:open() if not no["trapeast"]:is("fl_bridge") then wo[no["trapeast"]] = {"fl_bridge_bw", "trapeast", state=OPEN} .. ti{"it_trap"} no["trapeast"]:close() end else no["trapeast"]:open() if not no["trapwest"]:is("fl_bridge") then wo[no["trapwest"]] = {"fl_bridge_bw", "trapwest", state=OPEN} .. ti{"it_trap"} no["trapwest"]:close() end end else if trap == WEST then wo[no["trapwest"]] = {"fl_fake_abyss", "trapwest"} .. ti{"it_nil"} trap = EAST else wo[no["trapeast"]] = {"fl_fake_abyss", "trapeast"} .. ti{"it_nil"} trap = WEST end end end
switch_count= 0 function whiteswitch(value, sender) switch_count = switch_count + lib.lua.cond(value, 1, -1) if switch_count == 4 then wo[no["whitegate"]] = {"st_greenbrown_hollow", "whitegate"} elseif switch_count == 3 then wo[no["whitegate"]] = ti[";"] end end
wo:shuffleOxyd()
